DOC.brief_summary: To investigate dose response follow single inhalation Ba 679 BR inhalation powder COPD patient use pulmonary function indicator , compare data obtain overseas study finding
DOC.brief_title: Dose Ranging Study Ba 679 BR Inhalation Powder Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . In pulmonary function test Screening Test II , FEV1.0 le 70 % predict normal FEV1.0 le 70 % FVC . 2 . In reversibility test Screening Test II , FEV1.0 improve 10 % 1 hour inhalation 2 puff anticholinergic agent ( Tersigan ® Aerozol ) 3 . History smoking ( < . cigarette day x . year smoke > = 200 ) 4 . 40 year age old 5 . Regardless sex length disease period 1 . A history bronchial asthma 2 . A history atopic disease , allergic rhinitis 3 . Blood eosinophil 440/µl 4 . Continuous use steroid drug ( oral administration , inhalation injection ) dose equivalent 5 mg daily prednisolone 5 . A history respiratory infection , include virus infection within 1 month study initiation 6 . Tuberculosis , lung cancer history pneumonectomy 7 . Glaucoma 8 . Under treatment benign prostatic hypertrophy 9 . Hypersensitivity anticholinergic agent sympathomimetics 10 . Difficulty expectoration sputum 11 . Serious heart disease , renal disease , hepatic disease , endocrine disease metabolic disease 12 . Use β blocker 13 . A history myocardial infarction within past 1 year 14 . A history heart failure , cor pulmonale arrhythmia require medication within past 3 year 15 . A history drug abuse alcoholism 16 . Treatment psychotic disease 17 . Pregnancy , possible pregnancy lactation 18 . A history participation clinical study within past 6 month 19 . Judgment investigator patient ineligible inclusion present study
